blogs.title: Research Roundup: DOAJ’s clean sweep, A.I. in the classroom and more
blogs.summary:
This week in science, academia and scientific publishing:
The Directory of Open Access Journals (DOAJ) removed approximately 3,300 journals from its site.  The clean sweep affected journals that failed to submit an application to the online directory.
